name: La chocolaterie (elghinn)
description:
La Chocolaterie is a project created for Dogpit Sim Jam.

In this game you play a beginner chocolate maker who wants to open its first bussiness. But you have to convince the place owner you can make enough money to pay the rent.

The music is from: https://gamesounds.xyz/?dir=The%20Frontier%20-%20RPG%20Set
